thread.title: Venus Williams reaches seventh quarter-final of season in Hong Kong
thread.title_full: Venus Williams reaches seventh quarter-final of season in Hong Kong

title: Venus Williams reaches seventh quarter-final of season in Hong Kong
text:
Venus Williams reaches seventh quarter-final of season in Hong Kong 15 Oct 2015 14:46:57 
comments 
Venus Williams reached her seventh quarter-final of the season at the Hong Kong Open. 
The veteran American, who has won titles in Auckland and Wuhan in 2015, saw off China's Wang Yafan 6-0 6-2. 
Williams next meets France's Alize Cornet as she continues her bid to play in the WTA Finals for the first time since 2009. 
Cornet, who has won her last three meetings against Serena Williams but never beaten Venus, needed almost two and a half hours to battle past Yaroslava Shvedova 6-7 (4/7) 6-3 6-4. 
Second seed Angelique Kerber will face seventh seed Caroline Garcia in the last eight after both had comfortable second-round wins. 
Kerber defeated Kurumi Nara of Japan 6-2 6-2 while Garcia lost only two games against lucky loser Anastasiya Komardina. Related Sport News
